section.heading: Reporting requirements for entities receiving grants under the federal recovery act.
section.text: All nonprofit organizations, companies, associations, contractors, and subcontractors who receive a grant or funding under the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009, approved February 17, 2009 (Pub. L. No. 111-5; 98 Stat. 1861) (“ARRA”), shall:

para.text: As a condition of the grant or funding, list all jobs that shall be created as a result of the grant or funding on the Department of Employment Services website;
Provide the list required by paragraph (1) of this section to the Department of Employment Services; and

Inform the Department of Employment Services of the number of District residents hired for ARRA-funded positions once the positions created as a result of a grant or funding under the ARRA are filled.
